post.body: :-D I was wondering when it would catch your attention ;-)
Will be there.
nah, I was reminiscing 2001 and Maths exam which i got 35 in because i was up till 6 the day before playing Caesar3.
season 6 is the first season i am watching.
http://sliderocket.com has a air based pc version. Is very promising.
Completely and utterly de-motivated, Its one of those days.
At swarathma launch gig at opus
Donate to the projects which make RadioVeRVe happen http://tinyurl.com/85eemh
Heading to the Swarathma Album launch at Opus today, anyone else coming?
Cant seem to asleep. Time to count sheep!
Retweeting @kbhargava: Microsoft on FOSS: over the years - http://tinyurl.com/89wqv6
I almost flunked in one paper because of this game and yes also half life 2.
Woah, I played Caesar 3 till 4am again? Good lord its 2001!
RT @vijayanands: Looking for Startups/Companies which have offices near Nimhans Convention Centre to Host the Shotgun Startups. Anyone?
This year, i am part of a team which is organizing something called Shotgun Startup (http://shotgun.proto.in). Put in your idea now!
This is officially a marathon, 15 episodes of 24 in a day! I watch series like a long movie :-)
http://is.gd/8kG Would you have stopped and listened?
From mac forum, "Based on the title of your posting you should have no problem. The MacBooks get hot enough to burn any disc by nature" Heh
Blah, my dvd burner is not allowing me to burn. I want to watch 24 on big screen. Work dvd burner work!
Although i have been home for most of this week, Today feels like the first holiday. Got up late, made rava dosas with sister!
